{{Actor| | type = Gore | name = Medical tank | class = Tank4 | game = Strife | doomednum = 213 | convid = 34 }}[[Classes]]: Tank4
A medical tank filled with liquid, containing a strange organism reduced to ribs, a spine, lungs and brains. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Tank4 { {{Property|Radius}} 16 {{Property|Height}} 56 +{{Flag|SOLID}} States { Spawn: TNK4 A 15 TNK4 B 11 TNK4 C 40 Loop } }
